feature_model.name: VendingMachine

meta.data: Classen, A. Modelling with FTS: a Collection of Illustrative Examples. Technical Report P-CS-TR SPLMC-00000001, PReCISE Research Center, University of Namur, Namur, Belgium, 2010.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r VendingMachine(VendingMachine) :o CancelPurchase(CancelPurchase) :m Beverages(Beverages) :g (_r_2_8) [1,*] : Soda(Soda) : Tea(Tea) :o FreeDrinks(FreeDrinks) :m Currency(Currency) :g (_r_4_5) [1,1] : Euro(Euro) : Dollar(Dollar)
